website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SX610 HS is an attractive compact camera with an 18x zoom lens, but image quality takes a step back from last year's edition.
cons: Image quality suffers at moderate ISOs

customer_reviews.title: Long life battery a winner for me
customer_reviews.text: I am still working out how to use this but I really like it so far. The battery is absolutely brilliant and lasts for ages, will save a fortune in AA batteries on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Roz. G

customer_reviews.title: Camera was great until...
customer_reviews.text: Camera was great until the lens stopped working. It is stuck extended and I have an error on my screen. Currently trying to return to Canon for warrant fix. Will update with how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little camera and easy to use if you just ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little camera and easy to use if you just want a simple point and shoot without lots of different settings. Just set it up on auto and away you go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry, but the shots are not as clear as they should be with these megapixels. If there the light is good, the photos are a bit better, but otherwise not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Cannon rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 1 star because it won't let me give zero. Terrible camera, it won't connect to Wi-Fi. This is a bad camera from the world's worst manufacturer. Waste of money to buy cannon. I can't think of 1 good thing to say about this. Image quality poor, functions poor, battery life poor. Does nothing that it says on the ad. The biggest waste of money. Cannon will not last longer than a year with rubbish like this.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Vlogging Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy Vlogging. One touch recording. Good Mic. No External mic inputs. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I know very little about cameras, but I like this one - bought this after dropping my previous Powershot in a lake! Takes great photos, got nice features, good zoom, good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this camera! Worth the extra expense for ease of use and good photographs. Big fan of Canon. Quite heavy for a small camera but that's the price you pay for quality. The rechargeable battery is a major bonus for me, too.
customer_reviews.author: Andeeeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Canon Ixus in the past and loved it. This camera is as easy to use and takes great photos. Delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Wylda M. M. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Now defunct
customer_reviews.text: Functions fine as a camera but canon have abandoned support for this model a couple of months after I purchased it. So no longer able to upload photos without a cable. Making it worthless to me as I'm travelling, pretty frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased on behalf of someone else for a gift for his partner. He has set this up he said he loves it. It's a great product and that he keeps discovering different features that it will be second hand but the time she gets it Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Terri-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with purchase, haven't had time to read all it does but having great fun trying all the functions. Pleased with picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sheila Fergusson

customer_reviews.title: Great at first.... after two days use it failed!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for two days started off a great camera but failed on holiday which was really really annoying! Kept on resetting itself and powering off, luckily we managed to get some photos off the memory card, sent back and was refunded quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Quality Budget Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nicely sized camera. Easy to use. Wifi download to transfer your pictures to a PC/iPad . Good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SteveHammer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera for holidays but not Google enough for specialist .
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Child

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera, I carry it in my bag every ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera, I carry it in my bag every day, it is so much better than using my phones "camera" you forget how much clearer photographs can be when you use a real camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: For a compact camera the photos are very good and so is the video and i must say ...
customer_reviews.text: For a compact camera the photos are very good and so is the video and i must say to the other reviews i have read saying the audio is not of a good quality,i couldn't dissagree more i found it to be excellent👍
customer_reviews.author: skippy

customer_reviews.title: Love this little compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this little compact camera! Has a surprising rage of features for such a small camera. Easy to use and great photo quality. Delighted with it!
customer_reviews.author: linda ruddock

customer_reviews.text: Love this product, does its job. Wouldn't recommend for high quality videoing, just things you're not too concerned for. The pictures are great and the zoom is amazing. Not sure it meets its price though
customer_reviews.author: Fredi

customer_reviews.title: I'm no Spielberg, but this camera helps
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a better camera for my holidays, and when I get to grips with all the features, I'm sure it will be. I have to say that Amazon's service was great, and got it very quick
customer_reviews.author: R H Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Loving my canon
customer_reviews.text: Loving this Canon camera. It's optical zoom is brilliant and the fact you can take 3 photos at one time is good. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it with price!
customer_reviews.text: Its my first time having camera digital, its pretty easy to use for beginner like me. I really like the picture result and it came earlier than i expected. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MayaS

customer_reviews.title: Terrific.
customer_reviews.text: This tiny camera takes a great photo, and I am no expert. Terrific zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, not only produces great videos but the battery has a super long life. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Woobly

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera
customer_reviews.text: Husband really happy with this camera, really impressed, good quick delivery, punches above its weight
customer_reviews.author: Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: I am no expert photographer but I like what I can do with this camera so far
customer_reviews.text: I am no expert photographer but I like what I can do with this camera so far. The zoom is good and the pictures are clear. That's all I wanted so very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Disappoointed
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, but had to return as the shutter button kept jamming. Very disappointing as I bought for my holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice pics. compact camera
customer_reviews.text: A good all round camera for taking good quality snaps.
customer_reviews.author: james kelly

customer_reviews.title: not a great camera. my phone takes better pictures
customer_reviews.text: don't buy it. not a great camera. my phone takes better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: farhill

customer_reviews.title: Camera review.
customer_reviews.text: Just a bigger zoom to my Powershot SX 300,just as good pictures & all the familiar menu options I'm familiar with,great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fairhall

customer_reviews.title: ... to much just yet but what I have its easy & I love it
customer_reviews.text: Not used it to much just yet but what I have its easy & I love it. Came quite quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Camera -case to small!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely compact good quality camera, great for occasions when you can't bring a larger camera. Photo quality very clear. Unfortunately the case that was recommended I purchase was to small, I can't even return as my husband disposed of packaging before we realised. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon SX610
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, good features without being over-complicated to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with my Canon
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. The zoom feature was great, perfect for taking photos of birds and animals on my trip to Oz.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C A Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Small and packed with promise!
customer_reviews.text: An extraordinary amount of optics and electronics for the price.Nnice to use but full use of all its technology will take some months.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Alan Green

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for price
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Needed a small one for a wedding and this did the job perfectly! Some great pictures with limited experience of settings. Looking forward to seeing what it can do when I have learnt how to use properly!
customer_reviews.author: kathryn schofield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Superb little camera with excellent optical zoom - some of the best pictures we have ever taken
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for a friend he is very pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.author: yormils

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great small camera and you can wifi the photos too
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend!! Absolutely stunning camera and can't be beaten on price, zoom is better than your eyesight and so sharp and focused! Amazing camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: First impression very satisfied. Easy to handle camera. User instructions easy to follow. Early Birthday/Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: MRS J A WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. Even my elderly mother worked it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Does what it says -point and shoot. Very easy to use and really good zoom
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Ann Booth

customer_reviews.title: This camera was much better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: This camera was much better than I thought it would be, the zoom is just amazing for a little camera, I'm very pleased with it thank you :-)
customer_reviews.author: Titch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Very pleased with the camera just what I ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.Very pleased with the camera just what I wanted.Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing camera and it was £40 cheaper than anywhere else also came with memory card
customer_reviews.author: theresa haddley

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: a great camera well worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: HARRY  PROCTER

customer_reviews.title: Recomend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says on the box. Quick delivery. Easy to use brilliant point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for it's price
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best and cheap cameras you can get for the price and the zoom is absolutely crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Rasmus Thorsager

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality photos so far. Very happy with camera size and colour. Prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate. Very similar to my Ixus 500. Seems good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera takes excellent pics . Great if you just want to point and shoot. The zoom is good too.
customer_reviews.author: shellie Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the replacement for my ancient Canon Ixus
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK. Might be a little over priced for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Grieve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well its a great little thing .. zoom is excellent .. 10 0ut of 10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! 2 cameras bought for school classes. Good quality pictures and easy to use :)
customer_reviews.author: clare

customer_reviews.title: Got to love
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Purchased for my partner and I am a semi pro photographer so high standards and this meets her needs as point and shoot. Got to love canon
customer_reviews.author: Daniel peters

customer_reviews.title: Super little camera
customer_reviews.text: What a great little camera - very solid and well-made, and the quality of the images (certainly for the price) is amazing. I really like Canon's interface, too - easy and intuitive. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Cullum

customer_reviews.title: Easy straightforward camera
customer_reviews.text: A point and shoot as it says. I'm still practicing with features but simple photos and instant filming seem good - there is a vid button as opposed to having to change programs so instant response, ideal for grabbing unexpected unplanned moments.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Ware

customer_reviews.title: Great camera poor seller
customer_reviews.text: Its a great camera. My issue and loss of star is the sellers fault (Canon UK Ltd). I bought this as a gift for my parents anniversary as they were going on holiday and there camera was old and rubbish so we bought them a nice new one. When it arrived the case was bashed, wrinkled, obviously opened before and covered in sellotape which is not good when it is a gift but also as I bought it new not used its annoying even if not.... It seems to work fine but not happy it was in such bad condition.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Great for bluetoothing your photos to other devices
customer_reviews.text: Brought for the other half for taking pictures on her dog walks. She loves the fact you can then easily Bluetooth the photos to her phone to then post Instagram and facebook.
customer_reviews.author: ridingboots

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: After hunting around for ages for the perfect camera, I came across this Canon product. I needed something for travelling so had to find the balance between compact size and good quality photos. That's exactly what I found with this. It is easy to use with a range of features that I didn't even expect, and has the quality feel that I have come to expect of Canon products. The video quality is good and the flash is fantastic. I will be using this for travelling and also for everyday use. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: It does enlarge and diminish photos to the size you want them so in reality for such a low price the camera is good and efficien
customer_reviews.text: The camera is compact and quite efficient. I expected an Instamatic but unfortunately one has to wait for the go ahead to take the photo. I cannot comment on video as I use it more for photos than for video. It does enlarge and diminish photos to the size you want them so in reality for such a low price the camera is good and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Serracino Inglott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my wife and she likes it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Mefarmcon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY SHOTS AND WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DAUGHTER LOVES IT. USES IT ALL THE TIME. GREAT QUALITY SHOTS AND WELL WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.author: eric_the_b

customer_reviews.title: Great night out camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera. Only reason it hasn't got a 5 is that you have to actually push a button to put flash up to use it.
customer_reviews.author: PJW

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is purely for work purposes, so not looking for ultra brilliant shots bu it works exactly as its required, date stamps the photos and the picture quality is better than what we need it for so for leisure use I can recommend the camera. No need for set up, so for the non technical folk you can just switch on and take a pic. Plug and play transfer pics to a computer, charge holds for a good few days of continuous use
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: but the person we gave it to is very pleased indeed.
customer_reviews.text: It was a present, so I haven't used it, but the person we gave it to is very pleased indeed.
customer_reviews.author: J M H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality no better than my Ixus 275 and worse than my Nexus 5x phone camera!
customer_reviews.author: S. Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Beware the lens error
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes great shots, but is very flimsy - I took it out in humid conditions and half an hour later got an error message saying "lens error. Camera will shut down automatically, restart camera" from then on it wouldn't work no matter how many times i restarted the camera. Very disappointed as this was only a week after i bought it and it was nowhere near a beach/dust that could have clogged the lens.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for my use as an amateur. Results will be apparent after our summer hols!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: hmm, might just be me but I cant say ...
customer_reviews.text: hmm, might just be me but I cant say I am impressed....but then again this is my first canon. Think I will be returning to my tried and trusted Nikkon
customer_reviews.author: cho-co-latte

customer_reviews.title: I love my camera and it is perfect to take nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera and it is perfect to take nice quality photographs but I do kind of wish I had saved up for longer to get one with more features.. If you just want photos, its perfect and the videos aren't bad either but I find it pretty simplistic.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it much yet but very pleased with the camera easy to use and takes clear pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ellison

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed, blurry photos on all settings, most new smartphones make more clear images
customer_reviews.author: ludvik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it exceeded my expectations. Compact and reliable camera which you could carry in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: mary faith finones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bloggers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compact camera for social media addicts. Easy to set up and the battery lasts, although you need back up if you're using it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for any amature photographer. If you're looking for a first camera, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Brankin

customer_reviews.title: Canon SX610 HS Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera wifi is brill, i had not problems connecting to my mobile. Great pictures
customer_reviews.author: JaneyR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Superb camera - easy to use, compact and versatile, and very smart in appearance too !!
customer_reviews.author: Brian James

customer_reviews.title: My phone takes better photos. I would return this if I still ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the photos to be blurred - especially when photographing non static things such as animals. My phone takes better photos. I would return this if I still could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality photos in low light
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Very poor photography in low light.Only had the camera for a few weeks and it is not worth £130 we paid. There are very few settings (which I realsied when I bought the camera), and this being the case, expected in this day and age that the camera would take care of configuring itself appropriately. but it just doesnt. Other comments. rather slow to take pictures, having a "popup flash" is annoying that needs to be manually popped up, but that is a camera design feature.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus D

customer_reviews.title: I was sceptical about bringing a happy snap camera on holiday as I am quite happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about bringing a happy snap camera on holiday as I am quite happy with the camera on my iPhone6. Actually this is more than a happy snap camera. It produces great shots. Is intuitive to use and captured absolutely beautiful shots whilst in Barbados. It's small and tucks away easily. Not that I am dissing my iPhone camera, but I won't leave home without this little companion any more.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Can't handle light, my phone takes better pictures
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed with this camera. I've had a Canon PowerShot in the past, and with mere 5.0 MP it handled light better than this. I am astonished with the bad quality with the pictures. I often take pictures with my phone instead because they end up turning better. I've bought this camera to actually have better quality pictures and it defeated the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Nya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this as a pocket camera, does most of what I want pretty well
customer_reviews.author: JL, Hagley

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Staying neutral as bought as a gift so I only tested. Everything seemed spot on though from charging to playing around, vey lightweight and fact it also comes with its own charger is an excellent add on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i have problems.
customer_reviews.text: i have problems. It appears always a hand that it says the camera is in use and i can't push any botton
customer_reviews.author: Alessia

customer_reviews.title: it would have been nice to have had a proper instruction book with it
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying using it ,it would have been nice to have had a proper instruction book with it, also a lead to transfer photos onto the. Computer would have been useful making it a complete package.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sowter

customer_reviews.title: sent it back hated it would not comnnect to pc for transfering pics ...
customer_reviews.text: sent it back hated it would not comnnect to pc for transfering pics over lift up flash did not like it at all
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I'm an amateur photographer and I've wanted a little compact camera to keep in my bag for those on the go shots for a long time, and this is perfect. It's aesthetically beautiful, has the best focus ever, loads of different settings, I could talk forever about it! Would definitely recommend :-)
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pics!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Just back from a trip and it has produced great pictures not requiring editing apart from crops! It replaced an old Canon which was a trusty friend but was starting to have problems with the lens on zoom sticking. I'm so pleased I have ditched the old one for this. Worth the cost of a few new batteries and charger for backup. This is a MUST buy if you go for point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: LisL

customer_reviews.title: Canon is OK!
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact camera to carry around, light and easy to fit into coat pocket. Have not used the camera much as of yet but early signs are looking positive. Delivery was quick and price was competitive with other sellers I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for a Beginner / Lazy photographer, but with plenty of features for those that want to experiment.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my daughter. This is her first proper camera so she wanted something easy to use but with enough features to develop her photography skills. This is perfect for her as she can point and shoot anything but has the ability for more creative photography.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bunnage

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived a day late, but was early delivery, so no complaints. Item as described
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this..
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good camera - it handles light extremely poorly. Unless you have the most optimal light settings or you are always shooting on a bright sunny day the footage is grainy and dark and well quite frankly terrible.. I never write reviews but this camera was such a waste of money that i feel obliged to share this experience with others. Spend your money of a different model..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, but bigger than expected and sometimes difficult to focus
customer_reviews.author: caterina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter as an upgrade. Takes fantastic photos as you'd expect from Canon and also includes some great features for such a small camera, including a better than average zoom. Battery life is impressive, although I did buy a spare (slightly smaller capacity Duracell) as a backup for long days out etc. For people that just want a point and click with decent zoom, and aren't worried about having a manual mode, this is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Young
